title: The Tax Collector (1971, Comedy) by Michele Lupo | with Gastone Moschin, Philippe Leroy | Movie

sources.title: The Tax Collector (1971, Comedy) by Michele Lupo | with Gastone Moschin, Philippe Leroy | Movie
sources.description:
Architect Giambattista Manteghin, actor Romolo Moretti, Prince Pantegani and inventor Leonardo Rossi meet while trying to bribe a tax official out of paying exorbitant taxes. The four get together and conspire to rob the taxation office building, which happens to have been designed by Manteghin.

Original title: Stanza 17-17 palazzo delle tasse, ufficio imposte (1971) AKA: The Tax Collector

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/fNHbkcDcoSI

This film has Spanish audio, and subtitles in many languages.

Director: Michele Lupo
Writers: Sergio Donati, Michele Lupo, Vittorio Metz
Stars: Gastone Moschin, Philippe Leroy, Lionel Stander, Franco Fabrizi
Genre: Italian cinema, Comedy


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
